trans-unit.source: Specifies the painting style applied to multiple <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> objects contained in a form.
trans-unit.target: Specifica lo stile di disegno applicato a più oggetti <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip" /> contenuti in un form.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManagerRenderMode> is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager> class and sets the painting style for <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> objects that have their <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.RenderMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderMode?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManagerRenderMode> viene utilizzato il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager> classe e imposta lo stile di disegno per <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip> gli oggetti che hanno le <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStrip.RenderMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> proprietà impostata su <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderMode?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: You cannot explicitly set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.RenderMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to Custom, however the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.RenderMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is returned Custom when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Renderer%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> is set to an extension of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer> class that is not <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer>.
trans-unit.target: Non è possibile impostare in modo esplicito il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.RenderMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> personalizzato, ma la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.RenderMode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> restituito personalizzato quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripManager.Renderer%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> è impostata su un'estensione del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer> classe che non è <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer> o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer>.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the use of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer" /> other than <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer" /> or <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer" />.
trans-unit.target: Indica l'utilizzo di un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripRenderer" /> diverso dall'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer" /> o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer" />.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the use of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer" /> to paint.
trans-unit.target: Indica l'utilizzo di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripProfessionalRenderer" /> per il disegno.

trans-unit.source: Indicates the use of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer" /> to paint.
trans-unit.target: Indica l'utilizzo di <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripSystemRenderer" /> per il disegno.
